channel.title: Gitlab on Notes
channel.description: Recent content in Gitlab on Notes

item.title: Manage Generic Packages on Gitlab
item.description: Generic packages on GitLab are a convenient way to manage project artifacts. It supports versioning. They can be pulled and used in other CI/CD pipelines too.

item.title: Continuous Deployment pipeline for a Subgraph
item.description: Steps to implement a continuous deployment (CD) pipeline to deploy a subgraph to The Graph’s hosted service.

item.title: Backup Repository with a Github Action Workflow
item.description: I always like to have a backup copy of all my important git repositories hosted on Github. I use a private repository at Gitlab to mirror each of these repositories. Currently, I have a Github Action workflow configured to copy it on any git push on any branches.
